text: Edwarda de Oliveira Dias (born 22 April 1999 in Suzano) is a Brazilian Paralympic sitting volleyball player. She is part of the Brazil women's national sitting volleyball team. She won the bronze medal, Brazil's first in the sport, at the 2016 Summer Paralympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, after defeating the Ukrainian women's national sitting volleyball team by 3 sets to 0. == References == == Other websites == * Edwarda+de+Oliveira+Dias, zimbio Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian sitting volleyball players Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Brazil Category:Sportspeople from SÃ£o Paulo
title: Edwarda de Oliveira Dias
